author: hqucms
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes the implementation of scaling test in HGCalRecHitProducers by scaling up both the input digi collection and the corresponding calibration parameters. The scaling behavior is also put under the flag `HGCAL_PERF_TEST` (disabled by default) to avoid additional cost on the nominal usage of the producer.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles and passes local tests.

@pfs @IzaakWN
title: [HGCAL] Fix the implementation of scaling test in HGCalRecHitProducers
